attributes.action: Key workers should receive a hazard pay or not pay tax
attributes.additional_details: Because this people(key workers) put their life in danger going to work and being exposed to COVID-19 every day, travelling by bus and sitting close to other people who can be infected or even at work being surrounded by other people who can be infected.
attributes.background: They should pay the key workers as a hazard risk pay not as a normal pay or don't tax their incomes

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
